title: Farm Game Sound Pack
description: 'Farm Game Sound Pack.' Over 1750 meticulously crafted sound effects, from animal sounds to rural ambiance, ready to elevate your farming game experience."
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo


Introducing the "Farm Game Sound Pack," an extensive collection of over 1750 meticulously crafted sound effects, designed to transform your gaming world into a vibrant and immersive farm experience.

Within this comprehensive pack, you'll discover a rich tapestry of sounds, including 82 unique ambiences that capture the essence of life on the farm, 248 lifelike animal sounds that add authenticity to your barnyard, 75 sounds tailored for farm structures and buildings, 202 distinct door sounds, 47 engine and machinery sounds, and an impressive variety of 410 footstep sounds in 19 different styles and variations. To enhance the user interface and overall gaming experience, the pack also includes 200 UI sounds. In total, you'll have access to a staggering 1765 sound effects.

Whether you're creating a farming simulation game or looking to enrich your existing farm-themed game, this sound pack provides a vast and diverse library of sounds that cover every aspect of farm life. From the serene ambiance of rural landscapes to the charming clucks and moos of farm animals, from the creaking of barn doors to the rumble of tractors in the fields, every detail has been carefully curated to breathe life into your virtual farm.

Immerse your players in the world of agriculture, where they can cultivate crops, care for livestock, and build their own rural paradise. The "Farm Game Sound Pack" is the ultimate resource to create an authentic, engaging, and captivating farm gaming experience that players will cherish.

Experience the sights and sounds of the farm like never before, and cultivate a gaming world that comes alive with the "Farm Game Sound Pack." Transform your game into a thriving agricultural adventure today.
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: Yes

Windows and Mac: Yes

Support Dev Platform: Yes

-Dynamic sound

-Well organized
